entry.title: Scaling Bitcoin conference micro-report
entry.summary: The writer expresses disbelief in those who continue to trust governments given recent events such as the "war on terror", regional conflicts based on fake evidence, and disregard for human rights. The writer believes that anyone who does not view governments as a threat model is either a shill or an idiot. The email thread that follows discusses how Bitcoin cannot have clear direction until certain issues are settled. It is noted that the perception among people looking at Bitcoin is that a small group of developers and miners control decisions related to Bitcoin.
